fields.value: Replication Data for: YSOVAR: Mid-infrared Variability in the Star-forming Region Lynds 1688

dsDescriptionValue.value: This dataset contains all YSOVAR lightcurves of L1688 as published in YSOVAR: Mid-infrared Variability in the Star-forming Region Lynds 1688. The data has been processed and cleaned as described in that article. Please note that additional electronic data (e.g. a table of source properties) is included in the article and is available from CDS.

fields.value: In the published article, we promise a timely data delivery of the lightcurves used to IRSA (Infrared Science Archive - http://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu). However, we also aim for consistency over the entire YSOVAR project. Since not all clusters in the this project have been worked on, that data delivery is delayed. In the meantime, this should be treated as the authoritative copy of the data.

files.description: This fits files contains a list of photometric datapoints. For each datapoint the source (Ra, Dec, Name), the filter (filter) and the time (time) is given in the table.
files.label: YSOVAR_L1688_manualcor.fits

dataFile.description: This fits files contains a list of photometric datapoints. For each datapoint the source (Ra, Dec, Name), the filter (filter) and the time (time) is given in the table.
